attributes.action: Government to make our borders safe or pay for ALL of the damage caused
attributes.additional_details: Any trucker that has been through our borders will say that their vehicles have been set fire too, smashed up, tyres popped, mirrors broken off. Turn to Facebook and see the videos upon videos of what these immigrants are doing to the British and non British truck drivers that do their job to provide them! Why are the government protecting those causing damage? MAKE IT SAFE OR PAY ALL DAMAGE COSTS
attributes.background: Petition to make our borders safe or for the government to pay for ALL the damages caused. Why should we go through our borders doing our job with our vehicles being damaged or set alight or tyres popped. Where's the government to protect us British citizens? Too busy protecting the immigrants!

rejection.details: Law and order in Calais is the responsibility of the French authorities.
